snippet: In her new book, Patricia Cohen charts the invention and evolution of middle age and considers what the concept means today.
abstract: Gail Sheehy reviews book In Our Prime: The Invention of Middle Age by Patricia Cohen.
lead_paragraph: In her new book, Patricia Cohen charts the invention and evolution of middle age and considers what the concept means today.

headline.seo: ‘In Our Prime: The Invention of Middle Age,’ by Patricia Cohen
headline.main: That Vague, Crepuscular Time When Youth Has Passed: What Is It?
headline.print_headline: That Vague, Crepuscular Time When Youth Has Passed: What Is It?
